analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0x362a95215564d895f27021a7d7314629db2e1649.sol:
	Contract BlupassToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0x362a95215564d895f27021a7d7314629db2e1649.sol#91)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x362a95215564d895f27021a7d7314629db2e1649.sol:

Parameter '_spender' of BlupassToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/22/0x362a95215564d895f27021a7d7314629db2e1649.sol#180) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_spender' of BlupassToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/22/0x362a95215564d895f27021a7d7314629db2e1649.sol#198-199) is not in mixedCase
